Name: 梦落凡尘
About the game: This is a plot based RPG game. The plot of the game is humorous. It tells the story of the protagonists who like Tang poetry and Song Ci all the way chasing their dreams, defeating the devil and saving the world. Introduction to the game Zhang Xiaofeng is a 2B youth who can only recite poems and make mistakes. He has been secretly in love with xiaorou. Just as Xiaofeng wants to confess, he suddenly receives the task of saving the world. Although Xiaofeng is reluctant to part with xiaorou, he resolutely starts the journey of saving the world. What is the fate waiting for Xiaofeng, and where will their feelings go? With the advance of adventure, the truth of the world is revealed... Game features This is a story of defeating the great devil to save the world. The difference is that the story takes place around us rather than in a fantasy country. Who is the great devil? Why should we beat him? All the answers are in the game. But I am sure that you must have met the great devil. So this game is about my story, but also our story, the game plot is humorous, I hope you can become always positive and optimistic brave. QQ communication group:1007185863
